trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_SEQ_00<tab>This unbloodied Dotharl needs help with a delivery.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the unbloodied Dotharl.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_TODO_01<tab>Obtain the chilled leather sack.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the chilled leather sack to Sechen.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_000<tab>You there. I require your help. I have to transport some provisions, but I cannot do it alone.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_001<tab>I await you by the river to the northwest. That is where I have left the food.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_010<tab>Thank you for coming. I wish to deliver all of this to an Uyagir. You are doubtless wondering why I would aid someone from another tribe.

TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_011<tab>When I was born, the Dotharl khatun looked into my eyes, and did not see a soul she recognized. When this happens, it is thought that the soul of a noble warrior from another tribe has been invited to join the Dotharl.

TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_012<tab>But this knowledge gave me no peace. I needed to know of my previous life. I set about researching the history of the other tribes. Eventually, I came across the tale of an Uyagiri warrior, one that sacrificed himself in battle to save an injured Dotharl.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_013<tab>It stands to reason such a benevolent spirit would become a Dotharl in their next life. I am positive this warrior's soul resides within me.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_014<tab>Today is his─my mother's nameday. Her name is Sechen. I decided to give her this food as a present.

TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_015<tab>However, in my excitement, I have bought far more than I could hope to carry alone. I need your help to transport the rest. My mother dwells in the Hundred<var 1F /var>and<var 1F /var>one Revelations.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_SECHEN_000_030<tab>Ah, you must be the one he said would be coming shortly.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_SECHEN_000_031<tab>Oh my, this is much more than I ever dared expect! Look at all this fruit. Thank you so much.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_032<tab>It <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> your nameday after all. You should allow yourself to be pampered on this one day at the very least.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_SECHEN_000_033<tab>Honestly, you do too much for me. But, know that I am grateful. Your kindness reminds me of my son so very much.

TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_SECHEN_000_034<tab>I take it he has told you everything? As an Uyagir, I am not too familiar with the concept of reincarnation. As such, I cannot judge whether or not he is truly my son.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_SECHEN_000_035<tab>But one thing I do know for certain is that he has been a great help to me.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_036<tab>You are too kind. It is a son's duty to look after his mother. I have done naught special.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_037<tab>Now that I think of it, I have not properly thanked you yet! I could not have delivered Mother's gifts without you. Here is a token of my gratitude.
TEXT_STMBDZ608_02786_FOREIGNER02786_000_045<tab>Thank you for your aid. I have told Mother that you would be coming. Please give the gifts to her.
